name: RGB (NexoCol)
description:
This game is inspired by Ever Astudillo, a Colombian artist who portraits his social criticism thourgh his creation.

Follow an 8-year-old Ever after receiving a magical gift from his mother. This gift is a pair of shoes the can change of color when ever is jumping.

Learn about color theory with this amazing mechanic.

GAMEPLAY: https://screenrec.com/share/CNMaipkdyQ

Game made for Game Jam Lab 2020 - Museo La Tertulia.

TEAM:

Artist:

Katerin Suarez

Programmers: 

Camilo Espitia

Diego Guisasola

ASSETS:

Song: https://freesound.org/people/vollkornbrot/sounds/371976/

Keys: https://opengameart.org/content/virtual-key-codes-tileset

Pixel font: https://fontmeme.com/pixel-fonts/
